EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Effective Test Data Design (EN) - 2015.11.05.Email - Last Call Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register for The Art of Effective Test Data Design webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Art of Effective Test Data Design
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Do you find test data design to be laborious and time-consuming? Should smart test data design be a simple, transparent, and solid concept?
If so, we should talk.
In our newest webinar, Tricentis’ Ingo Philipp will share how to test smarter, not harder, with novel test data design techniques. Learn how to:
- Leverage the pain points of synthetic and authentic test data and turn them into gains - Get maximum reuse from your test data design with the least effort - Simultaneously retain the overview and enhance transparency in your test data base
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/the-art-of-effective-test-data-design-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> to attend our free webinar “The Art of Effective Test Data Design”, on November 5th, 2015 at 4:00 PM CET.
See you there! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/the-art-of-effective-test-data-design-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/the-art-of-effective-test-data-design-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu, Nov 5, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Ingo Philipp Product Manager, Tosca Optimize Tricentis
